# Innity

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="innity"
  data-pub="eda80a3d5b344bc40f3bc04f65b7a357"
  data-zone="62546"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For semantics of configuration, please reach out to your account manager.

### Required parameters

-   `data-pub`: Publisher ID
-   `data-zone`: Zone ID

### Optional parameters

-   `data-channel`: Channel code
